name: メカ-ON!
description:
Twin Stick controller recommended, but mouse controls work too!

A run-and-gun-and-sword-and-weeb-and-zoom-boom-fwoosh mecha brawler!

Mouse Controls:

WASD to Move

Left click to attack with Sword

Right click to attack with Gun

Spacebar to Dodge

Tips:

  • You will heat up when you attack, dodge, or jump. Once you're at max heat, you can't shoot or dodge, but you CAN use your sword. You will quickly vent all your heat if you don't attack, dodge, or jump for a few seconds.
  • You can deflect enemy bullets with your sword!
  • If you reach the boss, you've "beaten" the game, but it will keep playing on infinitely
